title: New Release: Papymic Sans
content: Combining the best of every Powerpoint-loving mother's two favorite fonts, I just released Papymic Sans. Available at [http://www.philatype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140623234922/http:/www.philatype.com/ "http://www.philatype.com").
author: kosal

comments.content: $399 for the exclusive license sounds like a bargain. I'm interested in this typeface for the branding of a new [fish stick product.](http://web.archive.org/web/20140623234922/http:/fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Poisson_d%27avril)
I think there'd actually be a market for that. ;)
